executiveSummary: Rasmus and Bo from TheMagic5 pitched their custom-fitted swimming goggles to the Sharks, seeking $500,000 for 25% equity. After multiple competitive offers, they accepted Robert Herjavec’s deal of $1 million for 6% equity, securing a strong partner to scale their business globally.
keyDecisions: TheMagic5 accepted Robert Herjavec’s offer of $1 million for 6% equity.

actionItems.task: Finalize investment agreement with Robert Herjavec
Plan strategy to scale U.S. and international sales with Shark Tank exposure
Expand production capacity to meet increased demand post-show

nextSteps: TheMagic5 team will collaborate with Robert Herjavec to expand sales, enhance manufacturing, and leverage the Shark Tank platform to reach more customers worldwide.
